content.rendered:
Dine Around the world Menu

All You can Eat Breakfast Menu

Dine around the world brunch! Indulge in a feast of flavors from around the world, served with joy, warmth & hospitality. 🍽

View Menu
Download Menu

Everything Dinner Menu

Dine around the world Dinner! Indulge in a feast of flavors from around the world, served with joy, warmth & hospitality. 🍽

View Menu
Download Menu

Burgers

Chargrilled Smoky Beef Burger

A succulent Volcano beef patty, chargrilled to perfection, topped with smoky flavors and cheesey Orgasms.

Chicken Louise Burger

A Crispy chicken burger infused with aromatic spices. Served with Fresh lettuce, Gherkins, and Honey Butter Sauce on a soft bun.

Lucy Juicy Burger

Immerse yourself in a realm of chicken bliss as our tender, sous vide-cooked chicken delivers a succulent and juicy experience like no other.

Camel Truffle Burger

A unique and indulgent burger made with tender camel meat and infused with truffle flavors.

Portobello Burger

A vegetarian delight featuring a juicy portobello mushroom cap, marinated and grilled to perfection.

Sliders

Mutton Slider

Savory and succulent mutton slider, served with fresh veggies and a choice of sauce. Perfect for a smaller bite.

Falafel Rice Slider

A delightful vegetarian slider made with crispy falafel, served with a bed of flavorful rice and accompanied by fresh toppings.

OG Beef Slider

A classic and mouthwatering beef slider packed with flavors. Served with lettuce, cheese, and a tangy sauce.

Brisket Slider

Tender and slow-cooked brisket slider, topped with barbecue sauce and served with pickles.

Waffle Honey Chicken Slider

A unique combination of sweet and savory, featuring crispy chicken on a fluffy waffle bun, drizzled with honey.

Oceanic Slider

Dive into a delightful seafood experience with this slider, filled with a medley of fresh oceanic flavors.

Deer Meat Slider

Indulge in the 2 exquisite flavors of tender deer meat in this gourmet slider. Served with gourmet toppings on a mini bun.

Tacos

Chicken Taco

Flavorful grilled chicken served in a soft tortilla with fresh toppings and zesty sauce.

Brisket Taco

Slow-cooked and seasoned brisket, wrapped in a tortilla and topped with flavorful garnishes.

Seafood Taco

A delightful medley of fresh seafood, lightly seasoned and tucked into a tortilla, complemented by vibrant toppings.

Dip Tricks

Lemon Butter briskit Fries

Savor the combination of tender beef strips, tangy lemon butter, and a sprinkle of herbs on a bed of golden fries.

Pasta Chicken Loaded Fries

Crispy fries topped with tender chicken, creamy alfredo sauce, and a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.

Lavash Nachos

Crispy lavash chips topped with a medley of melted cheese, salsa, jalapeños, and sour cream.

Curly Fries

Spiral-shaped golden fries with a crispy texture, perfect for munching on their own or as a side.

Appetizers

BBQ Chicken Wings

Juicy chicken wings, glazed with tangy barbecue sauce and served with a side of creamy ranch dressing.

Truffle Saffron Risotto

A creamy and aromatic risotto infused with truffle oil and saffron, creating a luxurious blend of flavors.

Corn on the Cob

Grilled corn on the cob, brushed with butter and sprinkled with a choice of savory seasonings.

Chicken Tenders

Crispy and tender chicken tenders, served with a tangy dipping sauce for a delightful appetizer.

Salads

Lavash Salad

A refreshing and nutritious salad made with fresh kale, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, feta cheese, and a zesty dressing.

Beetroot Quinoa Salad

A vibrant salad featuring nutrient-packed quinoa, roasted beetroots, mixed greens, and a tangy vinaigrette.

Rolls and Wraps

Lavash Roll

A flavorful wrap filled with a choice of protein, fresh vegetables, and signature sauce, rolled in lavash bread.

Pasta

Oceanic Pasta

A delightful seafood pasta dish featuring a medley of fresh oceanic flavors, tossed in a rich sauce and served with al dente pasta.

Chicken Fettuccini

Creamy fettuccini pasta tossed with tender chicken, mushrooms, and a delectable Parmesan sauce.

Pizza

Margherita Pizza

Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves, baked to perfection.

Honey Pepperoni Pizza

A delightful twist on a classic pepperoni pizza, with the addition of a drizzle of honey for a touch of sweetness.

Smoked Salmon Pizza

Indulge in the richness of smoked salmon, paired with creamy cheese and delicate toppings on a thin crust pizza.

S'mores Chocolate Pizza

A dessert pizza with a graham cracker crust, chocolate sauce, toasted marshmallows, and a sprinkle of crushed graham crackers.

Lemon Meringue Custard Pizza

A unique dessert pizza featuring a sweet and tangy lemon custard, topped with fluffy meringue and baked to perfection.

Desserts

Toffee Date Pudding

A moist and sticky date pudding drizzled with toffee sauce, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

Creamy Truffle Cheesecake

A velvety and rich cheesecake infused with the flavors of decadent truffles, served with a delicate chocolate drizzle.

MilkShake

Cheesecake Shake

A creamy and indulgent milkshake infused with the flavors of a classic cheesecake, topped with whipped cream and a cherry.

Brownie Shake

A decadent milkshake featuring chunks of fudgy brownie blended with creamy ice cream and drizzled with chocolate sauce.

Mojito

Very Berry Mojito

A refreshing and vibrant mocktail combining mixed berries, lime juice, mint leaves, and sparkling soda.

Black Lemonade

A striking black lemonade made with activated charcoal, lemon juice, and a touch of sweetness, creating a visually stunning and refreshing drink.

Frambay

Passion Frambay

A tropical blend of passion fruit and raspberry, creating a vibrant and tangy drink that is both refreshing and invigorating.

Beverages

Fiji Water

Pure and refreshing mineral water sourced from the pristine islands of Fiji.

Perrier

Sparkling natural mineral water with invigorating bubbles and a crisp taste.

Coke

The classic cola with its signature blend of flavors, offering a refreshing and fizzy experience.

7up

A refreshing cola beverage known for its bold and invigorating taste, perfect for quenching your thirst.

Fanta

A fruity and bubbly orange soda, bursting with zesty flavors and vibrant colors.

Coke Zero

A crisp and citrusy lemon-lime soda, known for its refreshing and thirst-quenching qualities.

Sparkling Water

Effervescent mineral water, providing a light and refreshing beverage option.

Ice Cream

Watermelon Sorbet

A refreshing and tangy sorbet with the flavors of juicy watermelon and vibrant pomegranate.

Coffee and Tea

Espresso

A shot of strong and rich espresso, perfect for a quick pick-me-up.

Latte

A creamy and velvety coffee beverage made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a light layer of foam.

Cappuccino

A classic Italian coffee drink consisting of equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam, creating a perfect balance of flavors.

Matcha Latte

A traditional Japanese green tea latte made with finely powdered matcha, offering a vibrant color and earthy flavors.

V60

A pour-over coffee brewed using the V60 method, resulting in a clean and flavorful cup of coffee with complex notes.

Pistachio Cold Brew

A refreshing and creamy cold brew coffee infused with the irresistible flavors of pistachio, creating a unique and indulgent beverage.

Hot Chocolate Smores

A decadent hot chocolate infused with the flavors of toasted marshmallows and graham crackers, reminiscent of a classic campfire treat.

Iced Coffee

Chilled coffee served over ice, offering a refreshing and energizing beverage for coffee lovers.

Iced Lemon Tea

A refreshing and zesty blend of black tea and lemon, served over ice for a cooling effect.

Green Tea

A soothing and antioxidant-rich tea, known for its light and delicate flavors, perfect for relaxation and rejuvenation.

Lemon Mint Tea

A refreshing and invigorating blend of lemon and mint, creating a revitalizing and aromatic tea experience.

Peppermint Tea

A soothing and minty herbal tea, known for its calming properties and refreshing taste.

Cereal Latte

A unique and nostalgic coffee beverage infused with the flavors of your favorite childhood cereal, offering a fun and whimsical twist.

Breakfast Ala Cart

Salmon Benedict

A classic brunch dish consisting of poached eggs, smoked salmon, and hollandaise sauce served on a toasted English muffin.

Zaatar Benedict

A Middle Eastern twist on the traditional eggs Benedict, featuring poached eggs, zaatar-spiced hollandaise sauce, and a sprinkle of sesame seeds.

Avocado Toast

A trendy and delicious breakfast option featuring smashed avocado spread on toasted bread, garnished with a variety of toppings. Two add ons Poached Egg, Scambled EGg

Turkish Simith

A traditional Turkish breakfast item, simith is a circular bread ring topped with sesame seeds, perfect for dipping or enjoying with spreads.

Benedict Croissant

A delightful twist on the classic eggs Benedict, with poached eggs, Canadian bacon, and hollandaise sauce served on a buttery croissant.

Shakshuka Cheese Platter

A flavorful Middle Eastern dish consisting of poached eggs in a rich tomato and bell pepper sauce, served with lavash bread.

Acai Bowl

A nutritious and refreshing bowl filled with acai berries, topped with granola, fresh fruits, and a drizzle of honey.

Ganola Honey French Toast

Thick slices of bread dipped in a sweet and cinnamon-spiced batter, grilled to perfection and served with a drizzle of maple syrup.

Berry Velvet French Toast

Indulge in the rich and velvety flavors of red velvet cake transformed into French toast, topped with a cream cheese glaze.

Brownie Chocochips Pancake

Fluffy and golden pancakes filled with chocolate chips, served with a dollop of whipped cream and a drizzle of chocolate sauce.

Sourdough Banotus Pancakes

Light and airy pancakes with a soufflé-like texture, served in a stack with a pat of butter and a dusting of powdered sugar.

Loaded Nutella Waffle

A crispy and decadent waffle topped with a generous smear of Nutella, fresh fruits, and a sprinkle of powdered sugar.

Breakfast Beverage

Berry Smoothie

A refreshing and fruity smoothie made with a blend of mixed berries, yogurt, and a touch of honey.

Banana Smoothie

A creamy and satisfying smoothie made with ripe bananas, milk, and a hint of vanilla, providing a boost of energy.

Orange Juice

Freshly squeezed orange juice, bursting with vitamins and natural flavors, offering a tangy and refreshing beverage.

Carrot Juice

A nutritious and vibrant juice made from fresh carrots, providing a refreshing and slightly sweet taste.

Watermelon Juice

Juicy and hydrating watermelon juice, perfect for quenching your thirst on a hot day.

Breakfast Set Menu

English Breakfast

A hearty morning meal featuring brioche toast, choice of eggs, ham, toasted sausages, baked beans, toasted vegetables, grilled tomato, marmalades, jam, and butter.

American Breakfast

Start your day with buttery pancakes, poached eggs, toasted bread, crispy bacon, and a side of marmalades.

Lebanese Breakfast

A flavorful Lebanese-inspired breakfast with hummus, olive labneh, falafel, pickled veggies, mix manakesh, and fresh vegetables.

Medteranean Breakfast

Indulge in an avocado toast or salmon fillet, accompanied by bread and cheese, fresh salad, honey, jam, butter, and fresh fruit.

Turkish Breakfast

Enjoy the traditional Turkish spread with Egyptian bread, boiled eggs, fresh-cut vegetables, b&f beans, ful fava beans, and koshari.
